content.rendered:
Tuesday, April 2nd  

     Today is an “A” Day 

 

                                                                   

Attention Maple Students and Staff! We’re excited to announce a brand-new monthly tradition here at Maple: Wellness Wednesday! On the first Wednesday of every month, we encourage everyone to embrace comfort and self-care by wearing your favorite pajamas or any comfy clothes to school. Our very first Wellness Wednesday will take place on April 2, so get ready to get cozy and join in the fun. Let’s make Wellness Wednesdays a special part of our Maple spirit! 

Attention Pop Culture Icon Club, we are meeting Wednesday, after school, in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. 

Today is the last day for 6th graders to buy tickets to the 6th Grade Dance on Friday! The link to purchase tickets will be sent out to one last time this afternoon via the Parent Square App – looking forward to seeing everyone there.

Jazz Band Club will rehearse this evening from 6:30-7:30pm in the Band room. 

There is no voice club after school today. Be sure to join us next week, as it will be our last meeting of the year. 

The student council meeting scheduled for Wednesday April 2 has been postponed to April 9. 

 

  • Lunch today is French Toast Sticks, Turkey Sausage Links and Home Fries.  

 Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 
 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
